item.title: About
item.description: Hello and welcome! Iâ€™m Mohammed Rashith KP, a mechanical engineer with a knack for problem solving . My Curiosity has driven me to explore diverse fields and my project requirements pushed me to consume enough knowledge to get the job done without getting overwhelmed and without getting dragged into the rabbit-hole of trying to be an expert in everything. My Journey I started my journey of cool technologies shortly after my acceptance to National Institute of Technology Calicut where I was exposed to various technologies spanning across the fields of mechanical engineering , robotics and software development.
